## upterm upgrade

Upgrade the CLI

```
upterm upgrade [flags]
```

### Examples

```
  # Upgrade to the latest version
  upterm upgrade

  # Upgrade to a specific version
  $ upterm upgrade 0.2.0
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for upgrade
```
